title: Artificial Intelligence and Instructional Design Innovation: Microlearning Utilizing Online Communities

context.additional_context: Course designed to enable novice professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to effectively utilize AI tools in science education settings. Provides informal learning experiences linked to real-time online communities via mobile-based short learning modules

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three impact factors of AI-based instructional design tools on science education
Through online community discussions, learners can identify two AI application cases and develop evaluation criteria
Learners can design 15-minute science education content using AI tools in a microlearning environment

resources: Access Permissions for Online Community Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
